Package io.github.rubenchristoffer.hetty

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HTTPConfig
    Class containing global variables used throughout the API.
    HTTPConnection
    Class that handles underlying TCP / TLS connection to server.
    HTTPConstants
    Class containing common constants in relation to HTTP.
    HTTPCookie
    Class for representing HTTP cookie.
    HTTPCookieAttribute
    Data class representing HTTP Cookie Attribute.
    HTTPCookieAttributeProcessor
    Class that processes cookie attributes according to RFC6265 Section 5.2
    HTTPCookieJar
    Class representing a HTTP Cookie Jar.
    HTTPCookieValidator
    Class used for validation if HTTPValidatedCookie is eligable to be sent to a given URL based on various criteria.
    HTTPNavigator
    HTTPNavigator is a class that builds on top of HTTPConnection (layer 2) and is used for following redirects and will automatically handle cookies for you between each request.
    HTTPPacket
    Class representing a HTTP packet / message.
    HTTPParser
    Utility class used for various HTTP parsing.
    HTTPRawPacket
    Raw HTTP packet.
    HTTPRequest
    HTTP Packet in form of a request.
    HTTPResponse
    HTTP Packet in form of a response.
    HTTPValidatedCookie
    A Validated HTTP Cookie has validated attributes.
    HTTPValidatedCookieAttribute
    Same as HTTPCookieAttribute, but it is read-only and is properly validated.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HTTPRequest.RequestMethod
    Enum containing the most known HTTP request methods
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HTTPConnectionException
    Exception that occurs when dealing with a HTTP Connection.
    HTTPException
    Base class for all HTTP exceptions (unchecked exceptions).
    HTTPNavigatorException
    Exception used when something goes wrong in HTTPNavigator.
    HTTPPacketException
    Exception used when something goes wrong within an HTTPPacket object.
